verses.verse: And all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265> from the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin <WH5512>, by their journeys <WH4550>, according to the commandment <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and encamped <WH2583> in Rephidim <WH7508>: and there was no water <WH4325> for the people <WH5971> to drink <WH8354>.

Wherefore the people <WH5971> strove <WH7378> with Moses <WH4872>, and said <WH559>, Give <WH5414> us water <WH4325> that we may drink <WH8354>. And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto them <WH7378>, Why strive ye with me <WH5254>? Wherefore do ye tempt Jehovah <WH3068>?

And the people <WH5971> thirsted <WH6770> there for water <WH4325>; and the people <WH5971> murmured <WH3885> against Moses <WH4872>, and said <WH559>, Wherefore hast thou brought <WH5927> us up out of Egypt <WH4714>, to kill <WH4191> us and our children <WH1121> and our cattle <WH4735> with thirst <WH6772>?
And Moses <WH4872> cried <WH6817> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, What shall I do <WH6213> unto this people <WH5971>? They are almost <WH4592> ready to stone me <WH5619>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Pass on <WH5674> before <WH6440> the people <WH5971>, and take <WH3947> with thee of the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>; and thy rod <WH4294>, wherewith thou smotest <WH5221> the river <WH2975>, take <WH3947> in thy hand <WH3027>, and go <WH1980>.

Behold <WH5975>, I will stand before <WH6440> thee there upon the rock <WH6697> in Horeb <WH2722>; and thou shalt smite <WH5221> the rock <WH6697>, and there shall come <WH3318> water <WH4325> out of it <WH5971>, that the people may drink <WH8354>. And Moses <WH4872> did <WH6213> so in the sight <WH5869> of the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>.

And he called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> Massah <WH4532>, and Meribah <WH4809>, because of the striving <WH7379> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and because they tempted <WH5254> Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, Is <WH3426> Jehovah <WH3068> among us <WH7130>, or not?
Then came <WH935> Amalek <WH6002>, and fought <WH3898> with Israel <WH3478> in Rephidim <WH7508>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, Choose us out <WH977> men <WH582>, and go out <WH3318>, fight <WH3898> with Amalek <WH6002>: to-morrow <WH4279> I will stand <WH5324> on the top <WH7218> of the hill <WH1389> with the rod <WH4294> of God <WH430> in my hand <WH3027>.

So Joshua <WH3091> did <WH6213> as Moses <WH4872> had said <WH559> to him <WH3898>, and fought with Amalek <WH6002>: and Moses <WH4872>, Aaron <WH175>, and Hur <WH2354> went up <WH5927> to the top <WH7218> of the hill <WH1389>.

And it came to pass <WH4872>, when Moses held up <WH7311> his hand <WH3027>, that Israel <WH3478> prevailed <WH1396>; and when he let down <WH5117> his hand <WH3027>, Amalek <WH6002> prevailed <WH1396>.

But Moses <WH4872>' hands <WH3027> were heavy <WH3515>; and they took <WH3947> a stone <WH68>, and put <WH7760> it under him <WH3427>, and he sat thereon <WH175>; and Aaron and Hur <WH2354> stayed up <WH8551> his hands <WH3027>, the one on the one side <WH259>, and the other on the other side <WH259>; And his hands <WH3027> were steady <WH530> until the going down <WH935> of the sun <WH8121>.
And Joshua <WH3091> discomfited <WH2522> Amalek <WH6002> and his people <WH5971> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Write <WH3789> this for a memorial <WH2146> in a book <WH5612>, and rehearse <WH7760> it in the ears <WH241> of Joshua <WH3091>: that I will utterly <WH4229> blot out <WH4229> the remembrance <WH2143> of Amalek <WH6002> from under heaven <WH8064>.
And Moses <WH4872> built <WH1129> an altar <WH4196>, and called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of it Jehovah-nissi <WH3071>;
and he said <WH559>, Jehovah <WH3050> hath sworn <WH3027>: Jehovah <WH3050> will have war <WH4421> with Amalek <WH6002> from generation <WH1755> to generation <WH1755>.
